test.name: To check by using help command

kw.name: Run
kw.msg:
${result} = usage: word_count.py [-h] [--sentence SENTENCE]
count of words in sentence
options: -h, --help show this help message and exit --sentence SENTENCE Enter a sentence
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the output.

kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

test.name: To check by using sentence without quatation marks

kw.name: Run
kw.msg: Running command 'python C:/PycharmProjects/bharath/testing-classes/word_count.py --sentence python is high level programming language 2>&1'.
${result} = usage: word_count.py [-h] [--sentence SENTENCE] word_count.py: error: unrecognized arguments: is high level programming language
kw.arg: ${command} --sentence python is high level programming language
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the output.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

test.name: To check possitive scenario by passing sentence

kw.name: Run
kw.msg: Running command 'python C:/PycharmProjects/bharath/testing-classes/word_count.py --sentence "python is high level programming language" 2>&1'.
${result} = word: python word: is word: high word: level word: programming word: language total words: 6
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the output.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
